GamePanel
The GamePanel class extends JPanel and implements Runnable, serving as the main panel for the game.
KeyHandler
The KeyHandler class implements KeyListener and handles keyboard input for the game.
Main
 
Player
The Player class represents a game character with movement and animation capabilities.
Title
The Title class represents a map title with properties such as position, size, collision status, and sprite.
TitleManager
The TitleManager class manages the game map and titles.
Vector2
Classe per la gestione della posizione del personaggio
Window
The Window class extends JFrame and represents the main window of the game.
